changes.title: Army lists updated for version 2.24!
description: Old army list are still available, and can be updated, however may be buggy!
It is recommended you migrate your armies to 2.24.

changes.title: Fix to army duplication
changes.description: Armies that were duplicated were incorrecty updating both the duplicated army, as well as the original army.

changes.title: Move Stat order from ATT/HITS/ARMOUR to ATT/ARMOUR/HITS
army count not correctly updating in army list
description: On the army list screen, army points were not being updated when the the points were changed in the builder
